ygData.subject: RE: WAaahooo!!
ygData.msgSnippet: This morning, they had this grouped in with changes observed in last patch. after I said something to the point that casters realm was on crack , or lived in
ygData.messageBody:
This morning, they had this grouped in with "changes" observed in last
patch.
after I said something to the point that casters realm was on crack , or
lived in a cave after I tested it, they took it out of the changes from last
nights patch, and added a blurb stating that it was from last weeks patch

From: Talies the Wanderer <snicker@...>

At 10:03 AM 1/26/00 -0500, you wrote:
>Got this off casters realm. Yay! no more waddling elves

<snip>

>Bards have had an animation fix and now sing while running instead of
>gliding across the land while playing their instruments.

This doesn't sound like they fixed the waddling - this was the repost of
the recent patch info.

*mutters*

Talies
